title: VetoDecision
description: Schema for domain authority veto check output. Defines whether a domain authority agent vetoes an output, the type of veto, evidence, and remediation recommendations.

veto.description: Whether the authority agent vetoes the output

veto_type.description: Type of veto: hard (blocks, requires human override) or soft (warns, orchestrator can override)

reason.description: Specific reason for the veto, or null if no veto

evidence.description: Concrete evidence of the violation, or null if no veto

recommendations.description: List of specific fixes to resolve the issues found

classification.description: Classification marking for this veto decision
